docs.snippet: Of the industry groups on the New York Stock Exchange last week, motion picture stocks did best. The Dow-Jones industrial average rose 2.5 per cent but Barron's index of movie stocks jumped 8.5 per cent....
docs.lead_paragraph: Of the industry groups on the New York Stock Exchange last week, motion picture stocks did best. The Dow-Jones industrial average rose 2.5 per cent but Barron's index of movie stocks jumped 8.5 per cent.
docs.abstract: Comment on last wk's rise in film co stock, reflecting indus gains; film cos in '74 had their best yr since '46 and predict more success in '75; grosses on various films noted; earnings of MCA, Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, and Walt Disney Productions noted; execs commenting include Richard W Steenken (Blyth Eastman Dillon) and Lew R Wasserman (MCA) (M)

headline.main: Market Place; Analysts Give Oscar to Film Stocks

docs.snippet: VIENNA, Feb. 22--A Soviet collector of modern art, whose exhibition last year in a Moscow field was broken up with bulldozers, today opened a show in Vienna....
docs.lead_paragraph: VIENNA, Feb. 22--A Soviet collector of modern art, whose exhibition last year in a Moscow field was broken up with bulldozers, today opened a show in Vienna.
docs.abstract: Aleksandr Glazer, Soviet collector of modern art whose unofficial art exhibit in '74 was broken up by authorities, opens art show in Vienna on Feb 22 made up of 80 paintings he was allowed to take out of USSR; is waiting for visa to go to GB where he hopes to make arrangements for permanent exhibit of Soviet art in exile; says he succeeded in shipping out of USSR 500 other pictures; pictures include several by Oskar Rabin (S)

headline.main: Nonconformist Art From Soviet Shown In Vienna by Emigre

byline.original: Special to The New York Times

docs.snippet: Why do our writers so much like writing about writers? There is hardly a novel these days that doesn't nuzzle a novelist (or a film that doesn't flaunt a filmist), and more and more poems put writers on parade. True, there have  always been poems ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Why do our writers so much like writing about writers? There is hardly a novel these days that doesn't nuzzle a novelist (or a film that doesn't flaunt a filmist), and more and more poems put writers on parade. True, there have always been poems about the art of writing, and there have always been...

headline.main: Mishap on Ski Lift Termed Accident
